articles.title: AFC Women's Asian Cup 2022: Australia Beat Philippines 4-0 to Qualify for Quarters - News18
articles.description: Australia defeated the Philippines 4-0 to advance to the quarterfinals of the AFC Women's Asian Cup.
articles.content:
Title contenders Australia pumped in four goals in the second half to beat Philippines 4-0 and advance to the quarterfinals of the AFC Women’s Asian Cup on Monday.
